children.onClick:
{{
	(function(){
		 if(vayNewAddCountry.text=='India')
			{
				storeValue('vayNewAddCountryCode','IN')
			}
		if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "IndNCAddCom"){
			storeValue("vayIndAddrType", "Comm and Reg Address-Both");
			storeValue('vayNcComAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayNcComAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayNcComCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayNcComDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayNcComState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayNcComCountry', vayNewAddCountry.text)
			storeValue('vayNcComPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			navigateTo('India Non Corporate Address',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "IndNCAddReg"){
			storeValue("vayIndAddrType", "Comm and Reg Address-Both");
			storeValue('vayNcRegAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayNcRegAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayNcRegCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayNcRegDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayNcRegState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayNcRegCountry', vayNewAddCountry.text)
			storeValue('vayNcRegPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			navigateTo('India Non Corporate Address',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "IndCrAddCom"){

storeValue("vayIndAddrType", "Communication Address");
			storeValue('vayCrComAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayCrComAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayCrComCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayCrComDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayCrComState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayCrComCountry', vayNewAddCountry.text)
			storeValue('vayCrComPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			navigateTo('India Corporate Address',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "IndKpAdd"){
			storeValue('vayIndKpAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayIndKpAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayIndKpCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayIndKpDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayIndKpState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayIndKpCountry', "IN")
			storeValue('vayIndKpPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			navigateTo('Key Person Add India',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "IndAsAdd"){
			storeValue('vayIndAsAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayIndAsAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayIndAsCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayIndAsDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayIndAsState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayIndAsCountry', "IN")
			storeValue('vayIndAsPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			
			
			navigateTo('Auth Signatory Add India',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "IndUboAdd"){
			storeValue('vayIndUboAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayIndUboAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayIndUboCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayIndUboDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayIndUboState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayIndUboCountry', "IN")
			storeValue('vayIndUboPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			navigateTo('UBO Individual Addition',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "EntityUboAdd"){
			storeValue('vayEntityUboAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayEntityUboAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayEntityUboCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayEntityUboDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayEntityUboState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayEntityUboCountry', "IN")
			storeValue('vayEntityUboPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			
Helper.updateAddress()	
			
			navigateTo('UBO Entities Add',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "IndEaAdd"){
			storeValue('vayIndEaAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayIndEaAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayIndEaCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayIndEaDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayIndEaState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayIndEaCountry', "IN")
			storeValue('vayIndEaPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			
			Helper.updateEntityAdminAddress()
			navigateTo('Entity Administrator Add',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "FgnAsAdd"){
			storeValue('vayFgnAsAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnAsAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnAsCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnAsDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnAsState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnAsCountry', "IN")
			storeValue('vayFgnAsPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			navigateTo('Auth Signatory Add Foreign',{})
		}
		else if (appsmith.URL.queryParams.bkPage == "FgnKpAdd"){
			storeValue('vayFgnKpAddr1', vayNewAddAddr1.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnKpAddr2', vayNewAddAddr2.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnKpCity', vayNewAddCity.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnKpDistrict', vayNewAddDistrict.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnKpState', vayNewAddState.text)
			storeValue('vayFgnKpCountry', "IN")
			storeValue('vayFgnKpPinCode', vayIndPinCode.text)
			navigateTo('Key Person Add Foreign',{})
		}
	})()
}}
